# resolveTasks(for:with:)

**Instance Method**

Resolves the tasks to snooze.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func resolveTasks(for intent: INSnoozeTasksIntent, with completion: @escaping ([INSnoozeTasksTaskResolutionResult]) -> Void)
```

```swift
optional func resolveTasks(for intent: INSnoozeTasksIntent) async -> [INSnoozeTasksTaskResolutionResult]
```

## Parameters

- **intent**: The intent object that contains details about the user’s request. Use this object to get the initial information, if any, provided by the user.
- **completion**: The handler block to execute with the resolution. You must execute this handler while implementing this method. This handler has no return value and takes the following parameter:



## Discussion

Implement this method to resolve the tasks to snooze. Use the intent object to obtain information about the tasks to snooze. Use the information in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTask] object to look up the corresponding task information in your app’s data structures. Return a resolution that includes as much information as you have available about the task.

## Resolving Details of the Intent

- **resolveNextTriggerTime(for:with:)**: Resolves the trigger of when to snooze tasks.
